author: Emily Ashton
title: New Zealand's Prime MInister Has Given The Easter Bunny And Tooth Fairy Key Worker Status For The Lockdown
description: Prime minister Jacinda Ardern said the pair would be allowed to continue their essential duties, but warned they might not be able to visit every home. View Entire Post ›
content:
The Easter bunny and tooth fairy have been deemed key workers during the coronavirus lockdown in New Zealand by the country's prime minister.
Jacinda Ardern granted them the official status so they are allowed to continue their important work while most peop… [+1031 chars]
